recipes.skystack::default: skystack::default | Acts as a front controller for loading configurations in a organised way.
recipes.skystack::firewall: skystack::firewall | Sets up a locked down firewall configuration, allowing traffic on port 22.
recipes.skystack::apache2: skystack::apache2 | Sets up a apache web server instance and virtual hosting environment.
recipes.skystack::script: skystack::script | Runs ad hoc scripts during the build process.
recipes.skystack::mysql: skystack::mysql | Sets up MySQL databases and users.

name: skystack
description: Configures a variety of applications defined from Skystack
